name: A Regular Platformer
description:
IPCA Game Jam 2016 Winner (First Prize)

The game changes the way the player interacts with the elements found in classic platform games, making them the opposite of what they usually are. Obstacles now help the player move on in the game and what they think might be helpful actually hurts them. This goes with the theme "Lie" because the player is deceived by what things usually mean in games.

Controls
WASD - Movement and interaction with objects
Space - Jump
